attributes.action: Make it legal to carry NON-LETHAL weapons in the U.K. as a form of self defence
attributes.additional_details: To simply make non-lethal weapons in the U.K. legal.
attributes.background: NON-LETHAL weapons such as pepper spray should be legal. This could be a life or death situation for anyone. Knowing we’re allowed to have things used purely to protect ourselves will make many of us feel a lot safer when going out and leaving the house.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Make it legal to carry non-lethal self defence weapons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568
